title: Promotion series S1 -> G5 expired after 3 days???
body:
Was 2 wins 2 losses into my promo to Gold 5. Logged in an hour after the 4th game and it said my promotional series had expired.
Its been 3 days since I got into the promo series so this doesnt make any sense. Riot supports website also says promo series under Gold 1 shouldnt expire at all.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q2

Anyone have any information about this??

Thanks
